thread.title: Morpheus Valley Resort Brings in Special Honeymoon Packages for Manali
thread.title_full: Morpheus Valley Resort Brings in Special Honeymoon Packages for Manali

author: Shailendra
title: Morpheus Valley Resort Brings in Special Honeymoon Packages for Manali
text:
Morpheus Valley Resort brings in an offer of 3 Nights / 4 Days honeymoon package which is completely devoted to couples in love. Honeymoon couples, who wish to live some magical moments in the tranquil environment of Manali, can avail this special package from 21st Dec, 2015 to 5th Jan, 2015. The resort greets honeymoon couples by providing them with an amazing welcome drink. The resort offers a multi-cuisine restaurant in order to cater the needs of couples from different parts of the world. They will get a luxurious accommodation in the resort including a complimentary gift of a flower bed decoration.
The resort offers various complimentary services like providing a bottle of port wine, honeymoon cake, a surprise gift, special arrangement of bonfire, complimentary half day sightseeing, and many more. All the honeymoon couples staying at the resort will get 20% discount on the services like laundry and food & beverages. The resort, with the purpose of providing full-on entertainment, gives them an opportunity to enjoy various outdoor and indoor activities at the resort.
A special honeymoon package at Morpheus Valley Resort can be availed in line with some policies. To begin with, the package can be extendable on Pro-Rata basis. However, the resort will charge extra as applicable. If a couple cancels the booking before 1 month, 1 week, or 3 days before arrival, the resort will deduct 10%, 25%, and 50% of package cost respectively. However, couples, if required, can cancel the package before 24 hours.
The resort strives to provide various facilities like luxurious bedding, luxury chairs, tea maker, coffee maker, private courtyard baths with modern amenities & shower cubicles, hot and cold water, intercom availability, in-house laundry service on chargeable basis, and many more.
Morpheus Valley Resort, with its special honeymoon package, allows couples to experience some precious moments to be cherished forever.
